description:
If you're a huge Green Bay fan, this is the app for you!  Green Bay Football Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team! 

You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Green Bay fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard! 

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Green Bay. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Green Bay Football Fans today! 


** Brighthouse Labs, and the Green Bay Football Fans application are in no way associated with the NFL or the Green Bay Packers. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
